PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^7Hey all!^7 ^x70FF70Ronarray^7 here and this is ^x70FF70^7my ^x70FF70^xD02090^x7070FF^7ENDGAME Version of ^xE05030BLEED LACERATE Gladiator^7! If you like the guide please make sure to Like the video as well - subscribe to the ^xE05030YouTube channel^7 for more content too! If you have questions or want to discuss anything build related - feel free to hit me on Twitch or discord, I will be glad to help.
^x70FF70 Discord^7 https://discord.gg/xDQVEQahMT
^x70FF70Twitch^7 https://www.twitch.tv/ronarray
^x70FF70YouTube^7 https://www.youtube.com/@ronarray
^x70FF70Other (Cheaper) Versions of this Build^7:
Day 3 Update Version - https://youtu.be/lyN90VC4QHs
League Starter Version (Very in Depth) - https://youtu.be/Xsgx58XIxuQ
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ^xE05030 ^x70FF70 Tips ^7|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|^7^7
^x70FF701.^7^xE05030 ^7^xAF6025^7Pick Skitterbots instead of Malevolenceif you have not enough mana (dont have enlighted 4).
^x70FF702.^7^7 Mana on rings is Absolutely Mandatory - Look into mana issues Timestamp in the video for info. ^7^7 ^x70FF703.^7 ^x8888FF^7^xE05030Vulnerability ^7is the main curse and ^xE05030Punishment^7 is second - Both are Automated using this tech - ^xFFFF77https://youtu.be/t3i_0PrZy60^7
^x70FF704.^7 ^x7070FF^7^x8888FFTincture^7 is VERY important for reaching DOT Cap easily and is added to the POB DMg Calculation as Custom Modifier in the Congfig. ^x70FF70 5.^7 ^xE05030!! IMPORTANT !! ^7- Since we are ^xFFFF77DOT CAPPED^7 Change the Config to Pinnacle Boss to Calculate DPS Further.
^x70FF706.^7 Everything else you can find in the video - please check TIMESTAMPS that I have created for easier navigation.
^x70FF707.^7 If you still have questions - hit me on twitch, link is up there. ^x70FF70^7 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|^7^7 ^x70FF70Thank you for checking the build out!^x70FF70 ^7^x70FF70Wish you a great league start^7^7!^7 ^x70FF70Please like the video and subscribe to the channel if you enjoyed it.^7 |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ^x70FF70

Skill.label: Lacerate 6 - Fortify OR Endurance OR Deadly A
Auras - Skitterbots instead of Malevol if no Mana
Put Aspect of the Cat in SHIELD
Less Duartion in SHIELD for Charges Uptime
